This game costs three hundred bucks
The best first person shooter game.

Things I gave to Counter-Strike:
1. Money
2. Time
3. Love

Also sold a kidney.

Things Counter-Strike gave me:
1. Arthritis
2. Rage
3. Hatred of Russians, Spanish, Russians and Russians
4. Broken keyboard
5. Broken mouse.
6. 9/10 ready
7. Server crashes
8. Stupid teammates
9. Competitive matches
10. "Ez" spam
11. Multilingual cursing - I guess this is a good thing?
12. Lag
13. Cheaters
14. 64 tick servers

Essentially - CS is a greedy woman, but I love her all the time.
